articles.description: No. 1 Alabama is among six SEC schools in the USA TODAY Sports AFCA preseason poll. Iowa State, Cincinnati and Indiana also make a big splash.
articles.content: By their very nature, preseason polls are essentially guesses. Theyre educated guesses, but since no football has been played, they should never be taken as ultimate predictors of success or failure.… [+3219 chars]
